Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/The Oblitercons/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/
Bumblebee/Serpentor/Unitron/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Ares/Sixshot:


Both robots were in range to hear Zardus' orders over the comm.

"You heard him." Nemesis said, transforming to biped mode and touching down 
to the ground.

"I don't wanna dig.  I wanna stay home and bake cookies."

"Shut up!" Nemesis said, holding up a hand as if preparing to strike 
Scattershot.

Scattershot landed, transforming to his biped mode.  He got down on his 
knees, and started digging around the Alliance Base with his hands.

Nemesis sighed and used his right wing to bring up large amounts of dirt (or 
is it sand the base is on?  Not sure) and putting them in a pile.

===

Unitron and Dark One landed near the Alliance Base, transforming to biped 
mode, Nemesis Enforcer yelling orders out to them.

Unitron headed for the Alliance Base, while Dark One watched the shuttle 
containing his men land.

Out came Double Punch, Manterror, Injector, and Bumblebee, Dark One powering 
up his optic lasers.

"Wait, Dark One, they're with us now, though we have to escort them to 
Zardus."

"Uh huh..." Dark One said, the five Oblitercons and four ex-Predacons heading 
for the Iron Fist.

---

Serpentor stepped out of the shuttle, beginning to dig after cursing Nemesis 
Enforcer out when told to dig.

---

Demon Wulf, Flesh Ripper, and Dark Claw came out of the other shuttle, giving 
Nemesis nasty glares when he told them to dig, the three robots heading for 
the Alliance Base.

---

Sixshot and Ares started digging, as ordered.
